backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, fields, and tasks with authorization checks, CRUD operations, and metrics tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI change requirements, affected frontend files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries describing the purpose and recent updates of various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Deployment and local development checklist covering build validation, login flow, core functionality, and smoke tests.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide documenting how to reproduce and verify field creation failure scenarios for anonymous users.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Detailed reproduction and fix documentation for a profile save failure, including root cause, fixes, and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables and light/dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading preReact globals and the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor/profile boot logic, and fallback error flows before rendering UI sections like dashboard or login prompts.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Implements a pre-React error fallback UI that displays sanitized boot errors if the app fails before React mounts.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Sets up browser-safe global shims and environment variables before React loads, then initializes boot fallback handlers.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Renders a searchable, sortable list of all tasks across fields, using memoized filtering and sorting.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field, handling authentication, actor readiness, input validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating tasks with scale inputs, duration, dependencies, and submission via createTask mutation.
Dialog component for editing a field’s name, icon, and color, with state resets on open and mutation on submit.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s attributes, duration, dependencies, and field assignment, including data conversion and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Card UI showing a field’s icon, name, task count, and averaged attributes, using computed colors and icons.
Detailed view of a field with task list filtering, sorting, creation, editing, and field deletion controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying a copyright note and link with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with theme toggle, user profile dropdown, authentication handling, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Confirmation dialog warning about overwriting all data during import and showing counts of fields and tasks.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login screen with feature highlights and a button to authenticate using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user name, handling authentication state and backend readiness.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Shows an error screen with retry, logout, and expandable diagnostic details including copy-to-clipboard.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button that toggles between ascending and descending sort directions with tooltip support.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders an individual task with attributes, dependency display, completion/undo flow, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, fields, tasks, and export/import operations with detailed error handling and identity-scoped caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, handling retries, errors, and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI for listing, searching, sorting, and managing Fields and Tasks, plus handling user auth, export, and import flows.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities to extract, classify, and sanitize backend error messages, including detection of missing-profile and stopped-canister errors.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Utility to serialize data (including BigInt) to JSON and trigger a client-side file download.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Helpers for converting between duration units, formatting minutes into readable text, and preserving total duration across units.
Normalizes various export errors into categorized, user-friendly messages covering auth, actor state, network, and backend issues.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines predefined icons and colors for fields and provides helpers to resolve icon components and color values with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Maps field-creation errors to short, user-friendly messages for login, actor readiness, authorization, and unknown failures.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and converts exported JSON payloads into typed Field and Task objects, handling BigInt and Principal parsing with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes profile-save errors into login, actor, authorization, or unknown categories using robust message detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based and standard routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, versioning, and a detailed list of existing frontend and backend features for an ICP task‑management app. Captures authentication, boot flow, actor initialization, error handling, and feature metadata.
